overview: Howard joined Arts Alliance Media in April 2005 from Universal Pictures International where he was CFO/SVP Business Operations based in London and was instrumental in driving the growth of that organisation from $300m to over $1.5 billion in revenue. Prior to Universal, Howard was SVP at PolyGram Video in New York helping to grow that business from revenue of $40 million to $300 million over a 5 year period. Earlier in his career, Howard worked at EMI Music Publishing and in the video and theatrical divisions of Orion Pictures. Howard has a B.S. in Applied Economics from Hofstra University and an M.B.A. in Finance from Baruch College.
